com.facebook.buck.command

Class LocalBuildExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.command.LocalBuildExecutor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BuildExecutor

    public class LocalBuildExecutor
extends Object
implements BuildExecutor
    Used to build a given set of targets on the local machine.
